GK20bhasdutu:8: sūtradhāraḥ pādaḥ pāyādupendrasya sarvalokotsavaḥ sa vaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:10: evamāryamiśrān vijñāpayāmi| aye kiṃ nu khalu mayi vijñāpanavyagre śabda iva śrūyate| aṅga
GK20bhasdutu:13: bho bhoḥ pratihārādhikṛtāḥ mahārājo duryodhanaḥ samājñāpayati|
GK20bhasdutu:17: niṣkrāntaḥ| sthāpanā| tataḥ praviśati kāñcukīyaḥ| kāñcukīyaḥ bho bhoḥ pratihārādhikṛtāḥ mahārājo duryodhanaḥ samājñāpayati| adya sarvapārthivaiḥ saha
GK20bhasdutu:19: ayaṃ mahārājo duryodhana ita evābhivartate| ya eṣaḥ
GK20bhasdutu:23: tataḥ praviśati yathānirdiṣṭo duryodhanaḥ| duryodhanaḥ uddhūtaroṣamiva me
GK20bhasdutu:24: hṛdayaṃ saharṣaṃ prāptaṃ raṇotsavamimaṃ sahasā vicintya| icchāmi pāṇḍavabale varavāraṇānā-
GK20bhasdutu:25: mutkṛttadantamusalāni mukhāni kartum|| 4|| kāñcukīyaḥ jayatu mahārājaḥ| mahārājaśāsanātsamānītaṃ
GK20bhasdutu:29: niṣkrāntaḥ| duryodhanaḥ āryau vaikarṇavarṣadevau ucyatām| asti mamaikādaśākṣauhiṇībalasamudayaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:33: ācārya abhivādaye| praviśatu bhavānmantraśālām| pitāmaha abhivādaye|
GK20bhasdutu:35: bhavānmantraśālām| mātula abhivādaye| praviśatu bhavānmantraśālām| āryau vaikarṇavarṣadevau praviśatāṃ bhavantau| bho bhoḥ sarvakṣatriyāḥ svairaṃ praviśantu bhavantaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:37: praviśya|ācārya etatkūrmāsanam| āsyatām| pitāmaha etatsiṃhāsanam| āsyatām|
GK20bhasdutu:39: etaccarmāsanam| āsyatām| āryau vaikarṇavarṣadevau āsātāṃ bhavantau| bho bhoḥ sarvakṣatriyāḥ svairamāsatāṃ bhavantaḥ| kimiti kimiti| mahārājo nāsta iti| aho
GK20bhasdutu:47: kimāha mātulaḥ| atrabhavati gāṅgeye sthite ko.anyaḥ
GK20bhasdutu:50: bhavatu bhavatu pitāmaha eva bhavatu| vayamapyetadabhilaṣāmaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:52: gāṅgeyamūrdhni patitairabhiṣekatoyaiḥ sārdhaṃ patantu hṛdayāni narādhipānām|| 5||
GK20bhasdutu:54: kāñcukīyaḥ jayatu mahārājaḥ| eṣa khalu pāṇḍavaskandhāvārāddautyenāgataḥ puruṣottamo
GK20bhasdutu:56: duryodhanaḥ mā tāvat| bho bādarāyaṇa kiṃ kiṃ kaṃsabhṛtyo dāmodarastava puruṣottamaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:57: sa gopālakastava puruṣottamaḥ| bārhadrathāpahṛtaviṣayakīrtibhogastava puruṣottamaḥ| aho pārthivāsannamāśritya bhṛtyajanasya samudācāraḥ| sagarvaṃ khalvasya vacanam| ā apadhvaṃsa|
GK20bhasdutu:58: kāñcukīyaḥ prasīdatu mahārājaḥ| saṃbhrameṇa samudācāro vismṛtaḥ|pādayoḥ patati|
GK20bhasdutu:59: duryodhanaḥ saṃbhrama iti| ā manuṣyāṇāmastyeva saṃbhramaḥ| uttiṣṭhotiṣṭha|
GK20bhasdutu:62: duryodhanaḥ idānīṃ prasanno.asmi| ka eṣa dūtaḥ prāptaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:64: duryodhanaḥ keśava iti| evameṣṭavyam| ayameva samudācāraḥ| bho bho rājānaḥ
GK20bhasdutu:67: kimāhurbhavantaḥ| arghyapradānena pūjayitavyaḥ keśava iti| na me rocate|
GK20bhasdutu:69: grahaṇamupagate tu vāsubhadre hṛtanayanā iva pāṇḍavā bhaveyuḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:71: api ca yo.atra keśavasya pratyutthāsyati sa mayā dvādaśasuvarṇabhāreṇa daṇḍyaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:72: tadapramattā bhavantu bhavantaḥ|ātmagatam|ko nu khalvidānīṃ mamāpratyutthānasyopāyaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:73: hanta dṛṣṭa upāyaḥ|prakāśam|bādarāyaṇa ānīyatāṃ sa citrapaṭo nanu yatra draupadīkeśāmbarāvakarṣaṇamālikhitam|ātmagatam|tasmindṛṣṭivinyāsaṃ
GK20bhasdutu:76: kāñcukīyaḥ yadājñāpayati mahārājaḥ|niṣkramya praviśya|jayatu mahārājaḥ| ayaṃ sa citrapaṭaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:79: duryodhanaḥ aho darśanīyo.ayaṃ citrapaṭaḥ| eṣa duḥśāsano draupadīṃ keśahaste
GK20bhasdutu:82: eṣa durātmā bhīmaḥ sarvarājasamakṣamavamānitāṃ draupadīṃ dṛṣṭvā pravṛddhāmarṣaḥ sabhāstambhaṃ tulayati| eṣa yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GK20bhasdutu:90: vigatamaraṇaśaṅkau satvaraṃ bhrātaraṃ me harimiva mṛgapotau
GK20bhasdutu:93: nīco.ahameva viparītamatiḥ kathaṃ vā roṣaṃ parityajatamadya nayānayajñau|
GK20bhasdutu:96: akṣānkṣipansa kitavaḥ prahasansagarvaṃ saṃkocayanniva mudaṃ dviṣatāṃ
GK20bhasdutu:97: svakīrtyā| svairāsano drupadarājasutāṃ rudantīṃ kākṣeṇa paśyati likhatyapi gāṃ nayajñaḥ||
GK20bhasdutu:98: etāvācāryapitāmahau tāṃ dṛṣṭvā lajjāyamānau paṭāntāntarhitamukhau sthitau|
GK20bhasdutu:99: aho asya varṇāḍhyatā| aho bhāvopapannatā| aho yuktalekhatā| suvyaktamālikhito.ayaṃ
GK20bhasdutu:103: duryodhanaḥ bādarāyaṇa ānīyatāṃ sa vihagavāhanamātravismito dūtaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:106: prāptaḥ kilādya vacanādiha pāṇḍavānāṃ dautyena bhṛtya iva kṛṣṇamatiḥ sa
GK20bhasdutu:108: śrotuṃ sakhe tvamapi sajjaya karṇa karṇau nārīmṛdūni vacanāni yudhiṣṭhirasya||
GK20bhasdutu:109_0: 13 || tataḥ praviśati vāsudevaḥ kāñcukīyaśca | vāsudevaḥ adya khalu dharmarājavacanāddhanaṃjayākṛtrimamitratayā cāhavadarpamanuktagrāhiṇaṃ
GK20bhasdutu:111: bhīmasya kopaśikhinā yudhi pārthapattri- caṇḍānilaiśca kuruvaṃśavanaṃ vinaṣṭam||
GK20bhasdutu:113_0: āvāsāḥ pārthivānāṃ surapurasadṛśāḥ svacchandavihitā vistīrṇāḥ śastraśālā bahuvidhakaraṇaiḥ śastrairupacitāḥ | heṣante mandurāsthāsturagavaraghaṭā
GK20bhasdutu:113_1: bṛṃhanti kariṇa aiśvaryaṃ sphītametatsvajanaparibhavādāsannavilayam || bhoḥ duṣṭavādī guṇadveṣī śaṭhaḥ svajananirdayaḥ |
GK20bhasdutu:113_2: suyodhano hi māṃ dṛṣṭvā naiva kāryaṃ kariṣyati ||
GK20bhasdutu:115: kāñcukīyaḥ atha kimatha kim| praveṣṭumarhati padmanābhaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:117: praviśya| kathaṃ kathaṃ māṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃbhrāntāḥ sarvakṣatriyāḥ| alamalaṃ
GK20bhasdutu:120: duryodhanaḥ kathaṃ kathaṃ keśavaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃbhrāntāḥ sarvakṣatriyāḥ| alamalaṃ
GK20bhasdutu:127: utsāhena matiṃ kṛtvāpyāsīno.asmi samāhitaḥ| keśavasya prabhāvena calito.asmyāsanādaham||
GK20bhasdutu:129: vāsudevaḥ ācārya āsyatāṃ| gāṅgeyapramukhā rājānaḥ svairamāsatāṃ bhavantaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:132: suyodhano.ayaṃ svajanāvamānaṃ parākramaṃ paśyati bāliśatvāt| ko nāma loke
GK20bhasdutu:137: duryodhanaḥ bho dūta dharmātmajo vāyusutaśca bhīmo bhrātārjuno me tridaśendrasūnuḥ| yamau ca tāvaśvisutau vinītau sarve sabhṛtyāḥ kuśalopapannāḥ|| 19|| vāsudevaḥ
GK20bhasdutu:138: sadṛśametadgāndhārīputrasya| atha kimatha kim| kuśalinaḥ sarve| bhavato rājye śarīre bāhyābhyantare ca kuśalamanāmayaṃ ca pṛṣṭvā vijñāpayanti yudhiṣṭhirādayaḥ pāṇḍavāḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:139: anubhūtaṃ mahadduḥkhaṃ saṃpūrṇaḥ samayaḥ sa ca| asmākamapi dharmyaṃ yaddāyādyaṃ
GK20bhasdutu:142: duryodhanaḥ kathaṃ kathaṃ dāyādyamiti| bhoḥ vane pitṛvyo mṛgayāprasaṃgataḥ kṛtāparādho muniśāpamāptavān|
GK20bhasdutu:143: tadāprabhṛtyeva sa dāraniḥspṛhaḥ parātmajānāṃ pitṛtāṃ kathaṃ vrajet|| 21|| vāsudevaḥ purāvidaṃ bhavantaṃ pṛcchāmi|
GK20bhasdutu:144: vicitravīryo viṣayī vipattiṃ kṣayeṇa yātaḥ punarambikāyām| vyāsena jāto dhṛtarāṣṭra eva
GK20bhasdutu:147: evaṃ parasparavirodhavivardhanena śīghraṃ bhavetkurukulaṃ nṛpa nāmaśeṣam|
GK20bhasdutu:148: tatkartumarhati bhavānapakṛtya roṣaṃ yattvāṃ yudhiṣṭhiramukhāḥ praṇayādbruvanti|| 23||
GK20bhasdutu:149: duryodhanaḥ bho dūta na jānāti bhavānrājyavyavahāram|
GK20bhasdutu:150: rājyaṃ nāma nṛpātmajaiḥ sahṛdairjitvā ripūnbhujyate talloke na tu yācyate na tu punardīnāya vā dīyate| kāṅkṣā cennṛpatitvamāptumacirātkurvantu te sāhasaṃ svairaṃ vā
GK20bhasdutu:151: praviśantu śāntamatibhirjuṣṭaṃ śamāyāśramam|| 24|| vāsudevaḥ bhoḥ suyodhana alaṃ bandhujane
GK20bhasdutu:152: puṇyasaṃcayaprāptāmadhigamya nṛpaśriyam| vañcayedyaḥ suhṛdbandhūnsa bhavedviphalaśramaḥ|| 25|| duryodhanaḥ bho dūta
GK20bhasdutu:153: syālaṃ tava gurorbhūpaṃ kaṃsaṃ na te dayā| kathamasmākamevaṃ syātteṣu nityāpakāriṣu|| 26||
GK20bhasdutu:155: kṛtvā putraviyogārtāṃ bahuśo jananīṃ mama| vṛddhaṃ svapitaraṃ baddhvā
GK20bhasdutu:158: svayam|| 27|| duryodhanaḥ sarvathā vañcitastvayā kaṃsaḥ| alamātmastavena| na śauryametat|
GK20bhasdutu:159_0: jāmātṛnāśavyasanābhitapte roṣābhibhūte magadheśvare.atha | palāyamānasya bhayāturasya śauryaṃ tadetatkva gataṃ tavāsīt ||
GK20bhasdutu:159_1: 28 || vāsudevaḥ bhoḥ suyodhana deśakālāvasthāpekṣitaṃ khalu śauryaṃ nayānugāminām | iha tiṣṭhatu tāvadasmadgataḥ parihāsaḥ |
GK20bhasdutu:160: kartavyo bhrātṛṣu sneho vismartavyā guṇetarāḥ| saṃbandho bandhubhiḥ śreyānlokayorubhayorapi||
GK20bhasdutu:161: 29|| duryodhanaḥ devātmajairmanuṣyāṇāṃ kathaṃ vā bandhutā bhavet|
GK20bhasdutu:164: prasādyamānaḥ sāmnāyaṃ na svabhāvaṃ vimuñcati| hanta saṃkṣobhayāmyenaṃ vacobhiḥ
GK20bhasdutu:166: prakāśam|bhoḥ suyodhana kiṃ na jānīṣe.arjunasya balaparākramam|
GK20bhasdutu:169: kairātaṃ vapurāsthitaḥ paśupatiryuddhena saṃtoṣito vahneḥ khāṇḍavamaśnataḥ sumahatī vṛṣṭiḥ śaraiśchāditā| devendrārtikarā nivātakavacā nītāḥ kṣayaṃ līlayā nanvekena
GK20bhasdutu:172: nanu tvaṃ citrasenena nīyamāno nabhastalam| vikrośanghoṣayātrāyāṃ phalgunenaiva mokṣitaḥ||
GK20bhasdutu:174: dātumarhasi madvākyādrājyārdhaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraja| anyathā sāgarāntāṃ gāṃ
GK20bhasdutu:175: hariṣyanti hi pāṇḍavāḥ|| 34|| duryodhanaḥ kathaṃ kathaṃ| hariṣyanti hi pāṇḍavāḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:176: praharati yadi yuddhe māruto bhīmarūpī praharati yadi sākṣātpārtharūpeṇa śakraḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:177: paruṣavacanadakṣa tvadvacobhirna dāsye tṛṇamapi pitṛbhukte vīryagupte
GK20bhasdutu:179: 35|| vāsudevaḥ bhoḥ kurukulakalaṅkabhūta ayaśolubdha vayaṃ kila tṛṇāntarābhibhāṣakāḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:181: avadhyāṃ pramadāṃ hatvā hayaṃ govṛṣameva ca| mallānapi sunirlajjo vaktumicchasi
GK20bhasdutu:183: 36|| vāsudevaḥ bhoḥ suyodhana nanu kṣipasi mām|
GK20bhasdutu:186: duryodhanaḥ gaccha gaccha paśukhuroddhatareṇurūpitāṅgo vrajameva| viphalīkṛtaḥ kālaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:188: evamastu| na vayamanuktasaṃdeśā gantumicchāmaḥ| tadākarṇyatāṃ yudhiṣṭhirasya saṃdeśaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:191: avanatanṛpamaṇḍalānuyātraiḥ saha kathayāmi bhavadvidhairna bhāṣe|| 37|| vāsudevaḥ na vyāharati kila māṃ suyodhanaḥ| bhoḥ śaṭha bāndhavaniḥsneha kāka kekara piṅgala|
GK20bhasdutu:194: duryodhanaḥ kathaṃ yāsyati kila keśavaḥ| duḥśāsana durmarṣaṇa durmukha durbuddhe duṣṭeśvara dūtasamudācāramatikrāntaḥ keśavo badhyatām| kathamaśaktāḥ| duḥśāsana na samarthaḥ
GK20bhasdutu:197: hṛtabhujabalavīryaḥ pārthivānāṃ samakṣaṃ svavacanakṛtadoṣo badhyatāmeṣa śīghram|| 39||
GK20bhasdutu:198: ayamaśaktaḥ| mātula badhyatāmayaṃ keśavaḥ| kathaṃ parāṅmukhaḥ patati|
GK20bhasdutu:202: vāsudevaḥ kathaṃ baddhukāmo māṃ kila suyodhanaḥ| bhavatu| suyodhanasya sāmarthyaṃ paśyāmi|viśvarūpamāsthitaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:203: duryodhanaḥ bho dūta sṛjasi yadi samantāddevamāyāḥ svamāyāḥ praharasi yadi vā tvaṃ durnivāraiḥ
GK20bhasdutu:205: hayagajavṛṣabhāṇāṃ pātanājjātadarpo narapatigaṇamadhye badhyase tvaṃ mayādya||
GK20bhasdutu:206: āḥ tiṣṭhedānīm| kathaṃ na dṛṣṭaḥ keśavaḥ| ayaṃ keśavaḥ| aho hrasvatvaṃ keśavasya|
GK20bhasdutu:207: tiṣṭhedānīm| kathaṃ na dṛṣṭaḥ keśavaḥ| ayaṃ keśavaḥ| aho dīrghatvaṃ keśavasya|
GK20bhasdutu:208: kathaṃ na dṛṣṭaḥ keśavaḥ| ayaṃ keśavaḥ| sarvatra mantraśālāyāṃ keśavā bhavanti|
GK20bhasdutu:211: bhavatu dṛṣṭam| bho bho rājānaḥ ekenaikaḥ keśavo badhyatām| kathaṃ svayameva pāśairbaddhāḥ patanti rājānaḥ| sādhu bho jambhaka sādhu|
GK20bhasdutu:214: paśyantu pāṇḍutanayāḥ śibiropanītaṃ tvāṃ bāṣparuddhanayanāḥ pariniśvasantaḥ|| 41||
GK20bhasdutu:216: vāsudevaḥ bhavatu pāṇḍavānāṃ kāryamahameva sādhayāmi| bhoḥ sudarśana itastāvat|
GK20bhasdutu:217: tataḥ praviśati sudarśanaḥ| sudarśanaḥ eṣa bhoḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:220: kasminkhalu prakupitaḥ kamalāyatākṣaḥ kasyādya mūrdhani mayā pravijṛmbhitavyam|| 42||
GK20bhasdutu:224: vilokya|aye ayaṃ bhagavānhastinapuradvāre dūtasamudācāreṇopasthitaḥ| kutaḥ khalvāpaḥ kutaḥ
GK20bhasdutu:232: sudarśanaḥ kathaṃ kathaṃ karmakāla iti| ājñāpayatu bhagavānājñāpayatu|
GK20bhasdutu:233: kiṃ merumandarakulaṃ parivartayāmi saṃkṣobhayāmi sakalaṃ makarālayaṃ vā|
GK20bhasdutu:234: nakṣatravaṃśamakhilaṃ bhuvi pātayāmi nāśakyamasti mama deva tava
GK20bhasdutu:236: vāsudevaḥ bhoḥ sudarśana itastāvat| bhoḥ suyodhana
GK20bhasdutu:237: yadi lavaṇajalaṃ vā kandaraṃ vā girīṇāṃ grahagaṇacaritaṃ vā vāyumārgaṃ
GK20bhasdutu:239: mama bhujabalayogaprāptasaṃjātavegaṃ bhavatu capala cakraṃ kālacakraṃ tavādya||
GK20bhasdutu:242: mahībhārāpanayanaṃ kartuṃ jātasya bhūtale| asminnevaṃ gate deva nanu
GK20bhasdutu:244: vāsudevaḥ sudarśana roṣātsamudācāro nāvekṣitaḥ| gamyatāṃ svanilayameva|
GK20bhasdutu:245: sudarśanaḥ yadājñāpayati bhagavānnārāyaṇaḥ| kathaṃ kathaṃ gopālaka iti|
GK20bhasdutu:246: tricaraṇātikrāntatriloko nārāyaṇaḥ khalvatra bhagavān| śaraṇaṃ vrajantu bhavantaḥ| yāvadgacchāmi|
GK20bhasdutu:250: kanakakhacitapṛṣṭhaṃ bhāti kṛṣṇasya pārśve navasaliladapārśve cāruvidyullekheva||
GK20bhasdutu:251: bho bhoḥ śārṅga praśāntaroṣo bhagavānnārāyaṇaḥ| gamyatāṃ svanilayameva|
GK20bhasdutu:256: girivarataṭarūpā durnivārātivīryā vrajati nabhasi śīghraṃ meghavṛndānuyātrā|| 48||
GK20bhasdutu:257: he kaumodaki praśāntaroṣo bhagavānnārāyaṇaḥ| hanta nivṛttā| yāvadgacchāmi|
GK20bhasdutu:259: pūrṇendukundakumudodarahāragauro nārāyaṇānanasarojakṛtaprasādaḥ| yasya svanaṃ pralayasāgaraghoṣatulyaṃ garbhā niśamya nipatantyasurāṅganānām|| 49||
GK20bhasdutu:260: he pāñcajanya praśāntaroṣo bhagavān| gamyatāṃ svanilayameva| hanta
GK20bhasdutu:262: vanitāvigraho yuddhe mahāsurabhayaṃkaraḥ| prayāti gagane śīghraṃ maholkeva
GK20bhasdutu:264: he nandaka praśāntaroṣo bhagavān| gamyatāṃ svanilayameva| hanta nivṛttaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:266_0: so.ayaṃ khaḍgaḥ kharāṃśorapahasitatanuḥ svaiḥ karairnandakākhyaḥ seyaṃ kaumodakī yā suraripukaṭhinoraḥsthalakṣodadakṣā |
GK20bhasdutu:266_1: saiṣā śārṅgābhidhānā pralayaghanaravajyāravā cāpayaṣṭiḥ so.ayaṃ gambhīraghoṣaḥ śaśikaraviśadaḥ śaṅkharāṭpāñcajanyaḥ ||
GK20bhasdutu:267: 51|| he śārṅga kaumodaki pāñcajanya daityāntakṛnnandaka śatruvahne| praśāntaroṣo bhagavānmurāriḥ svasthānamevātra hi gaccha tāvat|| 52||
GK20bhasdutu:268: hanta nivṛttāḥ| yāvadgacchāmi| aye atyuddhūto vāyuḥ| atitapatyādityaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:271: kṣubdhāḥ sāgarāḥ| patitā vṛkṣāḥ| bhrāntā meghāḥ| pralīnā vāsukiprabhṛtayo bhujaṃgeśvarāḥ| kiṃ nu khalvidam| aye ayaṃ bhagavato vāhanaḥ garuḍaḥ prāptaḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:274: he kāśyapapriyasuta garuḍa praśāntaroṣo bhagavāndevadeveśaḥ| gamyatāṃ
GK20bhasdutu:277: ete sthitā viyati kiṃnarayakṣasiddhāḥ devāśca saṃbhramacalanmukuṭottamāṅgāḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:279: vigatakāntiguṇāḥ praśāntaṃ śrutvā śrayanti sadanāni nivṛttatāpāḥ|| 54||
GK20bhasdutu:284: vāsudevaḥ aye vṛddharājasvara iva| bho rājan eṣa sthito.asmi|
GK20bhasdutu:285: tataḥ praviśati dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ| dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ kva nu khalu bhagavānnārāyaṇaḥ| kva nu khalu bhagavānpāṇḍavaśreyaskaraḥ|
GK20bhasdutu:288: mama putrāparādhāttu śārṅgapāṇe tavādhunā| etanme tridaśādhyākṣa pādayoḥ
GK20bhasdutu:290: śiraḥ|| 55|| patati| vāsudevaḥ hā dhik| patito.atrabhavān| uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha|
GK20bhasdutu:292: anugṛhīto.asmi| bhagavan idamarghyaṃ pādyaṃ ca pratigṛhyatām|
GK20bhasdutu:293: vāsudevaḥ sarvaṃ gṛhṇāmi| kiṃ te bhūyaḥ priyamupaharāmi|
GK20bhasdutu:294: dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ yadi me bhagavānprasannaḥ kimataḥ paramicchāmi|
GK20bhasdutu:298: mahīmekātapatrāṅkāṃ rājasiṃhaḥ praśāstu naḥ|| 56|| niṣkrāntāḥ sarve|
GK20bhasdutu:301: ka iti| tricaraṇātikrāntatriloko nārāyaṇaḥ khalvatra bhagavān| śaraṇaṃ vrajantu bhavantaḥ|
